movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

reviews.title: Masterpiece of Cinema
reviews.content: One of the greatest films ever made. The storytelling, acting, and cinematography are all top-notch.

reviews.title: Simply Perfect
reviews.content: A film that stays with you long after watching. Morgan Freeman and Tim Robbins deliver outstanding performances.

reviews.title: Best Superhero Movie
reviews.content: Heath Ledger's performance as the Joker is unforgettable. This film transcends the superhero genre.

comments.commentBody: Totally agree! This movie changed my perspective on storytelling.
I've watched this movie at least 10 times and it never gets old.
Heath Ledger absolutely deserved that Oscar. RIP to a legend.
